about-content-1: For over ten years, Moving On Productions has provided accurate, quality postproduction subtitles and translations for non-scripted film and television. We provide transcription from video or audio files to typewritten documents for documentary filmmakers, journalists, authors and reality TV producers. We also work with marketing companies and will transcribe material from focus groups.
about-content-2: We have worked with clients including Food Network, MTV, Refinery 29, and National Geographic. We are proud to have worked with the team that produced the Netflix documentary Icarus, which was awarded the 2018 Academy Award for documentary film.
about-content-3: Our clients matter to us, and we always work hard to ensure that they have what they need, when they need it. We are willing to customize formats to the exact specifications of each project. We possess deep knowledge of the industry, as our team includes several people who have worked in television production. With our unique insight into every step of the production process, we know exactly what our clients require. We know fast turnaround is priority, so we are deadline-driven and offer confidentiality and non-disclosure agreements.
about-content-4: We are based in New York City and Los Angeles, but we can accommodate any time zone in the world. We are also a New York State WBE certified business and support other minority/women owned small businesses. We'd love to work with you on your next project. Place an order here and we can get started!
about-content-highlight: With our unique insight into every step of the production process, we know exactly what our clients require.
date-and-time-required-for-completion: Date and Time required for completion
format-content-1: If you have audio or video files, in any format, we can transcribe it for you. We can even take archaic technology off your hands and turn it into the written word. We accept all forms of Wav, MP3 and MP4 files and provide immediate upload through hightail or dropbox for your privacy and ease of use.
format-content-2: What do you want your transcript to look like? You tell us. We offer our clients full customization including time code placed at the frequency you require. Whether you need the transcript clean or verbatim and the copy being as broadcast or script style. Let us know the format of the final transcript that you prefer and we'll make it happen.
home-content-1: There are some things that still have to be done the old-fashioned way, and transcription is one of those.
home-content-2: We can use new technologies to streamline the process, but to do it the most accurately, it's all about the human ear and eye. That's why you need us, to automate the process for you. We'll help move your project on ... from audio to the page. Whether it's an academic report, a magazine article, a reality TV show, or a focus group, we'll use human expertise to identify speakers through overlapping voices, understand accents, and format to your specifications.
home-content-3: We understand that on any project, deadlines are important. That's why we offer rush and expedited services. Rush projects can be completed within 12 to 24 hours. For short projects, we also offer an expedited rate with the fastest turnaround of just double the time. Give us an hour of audio and we'll have it transcribed and back to you in four. Request a quote now for your rush project.
home-content-4: In addition to transcription, we can help you complete your project with subtitles, translations, and even copy editing.
lisa-smith-bio: Lisa Smith has experience in the fields of journalism and television production, working on shows including Extra TV, Celebrity Justice and with CBS Newspath. She was the broadcast operations manager and technical director for the student news program at Columbia University Graduate School of Journalism. Moving between New York City and Los Angeles, she has directed documentary film projects, and worked as a line producer and production coordinator on various independent films. Her passion for film and writing perpetuates her desire to facilitate other authors and filmmakers to tell their story. She has an MBA and a BA degree from Columbia University in Political Science and English literature.

name: Name
order-content-1: Upload your audio or video files here. We'll follow up to confirm upon receipt. If you have questions or concerns or prefer to use another method for upload, simply email:
payment-content-1: Upon completion of the project we will invoice you via email. Payment can be made in one of the following ways:
payment-content-2: Make check payable to Moving On Productions and remit to:
payment-content-3: If you would like to establish ongoing payments, simply fill out this form and we'll keep your information on file.
payment-content-4: We accept all credit cards. Please make payment through PayPal by clicking the button below
quote-content-1: Please fill out the form below and we'll get back to you immediately with a customized price quote.
services-content-1: Whether you're a PhD student writing a thesis, a filmmaker with a documentary to produce, an author writing a new book, a marketing strategist with audio from focus groups, or a non-scripted television show, we can take your audio and turn it into the written word. We will accept any audio or video format and create custom transcripts to your unique specifications: with or without time code, magazine style, or verbatim.
services-content-2: Need a translation?  We do that, too. Whether it's Spanish to English, Turkish, Swedish or Swahili and so on, we can provide translation and transcription for reasonable rates, providing the same ease as our simple transcription projects. Our translators reside internationally and are translating and transcribing from their native tongue to English. We can accomodate most languages.
services-content-3: Whether it's captioning for the hearing impaired or subtitles for another language, we offer accurate production ready transcripts, with translation, for closed captioning. We can also provide video captions for you that are YouTube and FCPX compatible.
services-content-4: We offer content writing, copyediting and proofreading services. We can draft content for digital marketing and sales, including ad copy, websites and social media. We also provide proofreading for brochures, direct mail, professional emails, resumes, cover letters or social profiles. Our team is made up of highly skilled, well educated writers, who are passionate about communication tools and the written word.
